SvcCatalogReqRelatedItem.name: SvcCatalogReqRelatedItem
SvcCatalogReqRelatedItem.description: Represents an item related to a Service Catalog Request.

Name.description: The name of the related item.

RelatedExternalId.description: Text containing an ID from any external system.

RelatedInternalRecordId.description: The Salesforce record related to this request. This reference must be for an object that has the following characteristics. It's a standard object. It must allow custom fields. It's referencable (that is, it can be the target of a lookup). It can be the target of a custom lookup field. It contains a Name field. It isn't dependent on a junction object. It isn't a virtual object or a setup object.
